title: WIFI Charger
creator: You Dream It We Code It

extendedInfo.description: Do you often stay out of power in the most compromised situations?Tired of constantly be aware of the battery in your smartphone?Forget all the problems of the battery, WIFI Chargerâ¢ has arrived.Nowadays we are surrounded by WiFi networks.WiFi networks operate by emitting electromagnetic waves.Each WIFI access point can cover about 200 meters away.To ensure network coverage WIFI access points emit more power than necessary. The most widespread WiFi networks (the 802.11 and its variants) emit in a range between -70 and -90 dBm with a power up to 10pW.WIFI Chargerâ¢ uses the WIFI networks excess power and uses it to charge your smartphone.WIFI Chargerâ¢ does not compromise the operation of WiFi networks at any time, only uses the spare power of the access points.If you want all the details about how this app was constructed,visit here: http://goo.gl/g6iNqWith WIFI Charger you can replace your microwave for cooking, charge your electric car, charge your flux capacitor, time travel, win all poker games, jackpot and football and convert you in the most popular of YouTube.Enjoy this Fake App and jokes to impress your friends ;-Pv1.2 New! Now if you connect the phone to the AC charger or with a cable to the computer,WIFI Chargerâ¢ multiplies the charging power increases much faster charging the phone faster!v1.3 More improvements in the flux capacitor to charge your DeLorean DMC-12. With this version you can now replace the microwave to cook, travel back in time and you can even travel to Mars before NASA.

reviews.title: Cook your meals with style!
reviews.comment: This app allows me to have a decent meal when away from home. Simply put your phone over a nice steak wrapped in tinfoil and let the app do its job. Please note that your battery must be at 100 % before cooking starts, because the app doesn\'t allow (by now) to redirect the collected WiFi power to your steak. Developer please fix this!
reviews.author: Walter Fabian

reviews.title: What a joke
reviews.comment: Hey owner.of this app your app sucks wow it seems that your a prankster well i guess you shouldn\'t put         puff what a flanker
reviews.author: Jason Salamoun

reviews.title: Fake app
reviews.comment: Doesnt deserve a single star.....phone battery dont get charged a bit.....
reviews.author: Akhil Gaikwad

reviews.comment: Ok..You got me...Even if it did work it would stuff your battery up by constant undercharging
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I downloaded this from Google play market on my I phone 6 and it charged instantly makes crispy bacon to. ... lmfao
reviews.author: alan sage

reviews.title: Cooks the Bacon well.
reviews.comment: Not so much the eggs.  I tried cooking the eggs with phone case on but doesn\'t seem to heat it through enough... will try with the steak this evening to see if it does it medium rare. Also the battery power is great, no need to recharge for weeks now. Nokia 3310 would have been 5 stars but waiting for premium version that powers the TV too
reviews.author: Dan Higgins

reviews.title: Useless Not to Install
reviews.comment: Not Worked on my Android 4.03 version..its totally crap delete from the market and from the phones also thanks
reviews.author: Zafar Iqbal

reviews.title: LMAO :D .. 500,000+ downloads.
reviews.comment: Looking at the comments, the single star votes and the grammar.. I have to wonder if we as a civilization have any hope at all LOL.................... Anyway, I thought you may be interested in a new app that I\'m working on.. it\'s a Water Resistant File Manager for Android phones.  So, when you fall off a bridge into the river below, or plunge into a deep lake somewhere, although your phone will be naffed, at least all your files will be safe.... I am looking for Beta testers now, and it seems there are many candidates right here...
reviews.author: Rob H

reviews.title: Snacks!
reviews.comment: Went into a grocery store with free WiFi, found popcorn, turned on app, then quickly hid tablet behind all the boxes on the shelf and watched the fun as everyone wondered how the popcorn was popping.
reviews.author: patrick connery

reviews.title: HTC Desire Old Model.
reviews.comment: I had my dauats for this app & I was right, it doing nothing & it took power from my cellphone. I had signal around 2.4. I had to give 1 star, because I cannot go further, actually  no stars was given by me.
reviews.author: Isa Amaan

reviews.title: huhu
reviews.comment: when i connect wifi my phone is charging..  but still lost my battery %  so im not sure this app is really good..  so make more update and more good..  make it real wifi can charge our phone..
reviews.author: Abbey Pepito

reviews.title: This app us amazing!
reviews.comment: This app is great! Not only will it charge my DeLorean, It gave Marty McFly an energy boost too! There us only one bug. I was hoping to get the new DMC-13, and this app doesn\'t support it! :( fix This for 5 stars s)
reviews.author: Charles Osberg

reviews.title: v1.3 rocked the park
reviews.comment: New inverter mode has made cooking of small foods so easy.  First I take my hot pocket set it on the counter place Nexus 7 on top of it, then YouTube Gangam Style wait for it to finish.  Then I hit repeat and jump around enjoying my meal! Note:  knocked a star off since it does take the whole song to cook and does a poor job on steak.  Missing a count down timer and requires constant WiFi use for max power (hence the YouTube video) . Amazing app!
reviews.author: Chris Barker

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: There truly are some very ignorant very gullible people out there... if you actually passed the third grade and can read you can see that this is a joke app...add in not actually functional... but very awesome as a joke
reviews.author: William Jones

reviews.title: amazing app
reviews.comment: i was dubious about a wifi charging phone charger but i got to admit i was blown away by how good this worked  not only did i manage to charge my phone in just 8 3 seconds.but i also managed to cook my bacon and cheese oatcakes on top of my phone at the same time AND best of all.it tasted better than i cook them under grill.  bacon cooked to perfection.cheese melted just the way i like it.ok.i had to take off one star because after eating my oatcakes my skin as gone a kind of blue.  other than that.amazing
reviews.author: lee douthwaite

reviews.title: JSB
reviews.comment: Gr8 app don\'t know why people are complaining about it, worked like a gem!!! In fact, I liked it so much I purchased the premium version, now I can charge all my phones from one point at the same time, seamlessly . The ability to utilizes excess sunlight from my solar panels is impressive enough, but, being able to utilize the spare wind capacity from our, single strand, washing line just blew me over! Thanks, what a diamond app! I would defo recommend this jewel of an app to my friends!!!
reviews.author: John S Blackmore

reviews.title: You have alot of time
reviews.comment: Why you made this app, just to make ppl goofffffsss. 00000 Star, zero.
reviews.author: Graan Khan

reviews.title: Its called a description!!
reviews.comment: For all those people that go downloading stuff without caring wether it works, or is maybe a virus, READ THE DESCRIPTION!! It clearly states near the bottom that it is FAKE. Think about it, could your phone really charge using wifi? Its impossible. Some people might say im stupid, but wake up to the real world. People create fake apps on purpose, to catch those mentally challenged people. Its not meant to work, its meant to be funny, a prank to pull on your friends. Don\'t judge an app by its name.
reviews.author: Jake Abbott

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love reading all the comments here where people were stupid enough to think this was a real app!  Seriously, if it was possible, don\'t you think they would charge a few bucks for something so convenient?
reviews.author: Chad St. Clair

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Is working now I\'m recharging time is lesser than before thanks
reviews.author: mira tanuwijaya
